messages.message: root cause seems to be same as the previous thread but cc @ayesha.ali here as well

ah okay so this is a problem w/ copying projects when ranked fields exist. b/c ranked fields specify input fields w/ class/field id instead of names, when we copy project, we need to first set the class field schema, then using the resp w/ the new ids for the classes/fields, we need to set the case schema.
